  • Method Details

    • prediction

      public List<String> prediction(String target)
      Takes every letter of target and appends it to a StringBuffer Traverses down nodes Calls recursive method
      Parameters:
      target - word to compare trie words with
      Returns:
      arrayList, containing the words most similar to target

    • recursiveTraversal

      private void recursiveTraversal(Node root, List<String> list, StringBuffer current)
      Recursively traverses the trie and appends words to current Calls isWord
      Parameters:
      root - node of the trie
      list - list of similar words
      current - StringBuffer that contains the letters of target

    • isWord

      Parameters:
      root - node of trie
      list - containing words
      current - StringBuffer of letters
